movies.title: Joseph in Egypt
movies.plot: Joseph, a young Hebrew boy who was sold by his brothers into slavery, finds himself in the land of Egypt. Frightened and alone, Joseph must now live in a foreign land among people who do not know the God of Abraham. Yet, despite the strangeness of his surroundings, Joseph does not forget the lessons he has learned at the feet of Jacob, his father. When cast into prison for a crime he did not commit, Joseph interprets the dreams of his companions and earns the respect of everyone he meets. News of Joseph's ability to interpret dreams reaches Pharaoh, ruler of Egypt, who is himself disturbed by a puzzling dream, which none of his court magicians or wise men can interpret. As Joseph is called to the court of Pharaoh, he remains true to his God and calls upon the Lord to tell him the message of the dream. Once again, Joseph is given the power to interpret and earns favor in the eyes of Pharaoh. Joseph, a Hebrew, rises in importance in the land of Egypt to become second in command only to ...
movies.simplePlot: Tells the story of Joseph from the Bible, when he was sent to Egypt by his brothers, and met Pharaoh.

biography.bio: Brian Nissen is a writer and actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The King and I (1999).
biography.name: Brian Nissen

biography.bio: Paul O'Connor is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Paul O'Connor

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Cindy Basco is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Practice (1997) and Judging Amy (1999).
biography.name: Cindy Basco

biography.bio: Anthony De Fonte was born on October 23, 1947 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is an actor, known for Beverly Hills Cop (1984), Guts and Glory: The Rise and Fall of Oliver North (1989) and Deadly Alliance (1982).
biography.name: Anthony De Fonte

biography.bio: David Kelly is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: David Kelly

biography.bio: John Pribyl is an actor, known for The Ruby Princess Runs Away (2001), Indigo (2003) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: John Pribyl

biography.bio: Mark Schwahn was born in 1966. He is a writer and producer, known for One Tree Hill (2003), Coach Carter (2005) and The Perfect Score (2004). He is married to Diana.
biography.name: Mark Schwahn

biography.bio: Scott Douglas was born on June 16, 1927 in El Paso, Texas, USA as James Hicks. He was an actor, known for The Turning Point (1977), The Dead Talk Back (1993) and Bundle of Joy (1956). He died on March 26, 1996 in New York City, New York, USA.
biography.name: Scott Douglas

biography.bio: Owen Davis is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Owen Davis
